metadata.title: CVE-2023-38560 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: An integer overflow flaw was found in pcl/pl/plfont.c:418 in pl_glyph_namein ghostscript. This issue may allow a local attacker to cause a denial ofservice via transforming a crafted PCL file to PDF format.

criterions.comment: ghostscript: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
